tasks.question: The Honest Dinner If you were forced to drink a "truth serum" right before sitting down for Christmas dinner with your extended family, would you fake being sick to skip it, or go and watch the chaos unfold?
The Grinch Proposition If the Grinch offered you $10,000 to ruin Christmas for your younger sibling or cousin (tell them Santa isn't real, pop their balloons, etc.), would you take the money?
The Gift Receipt If your partner or best friend gave you a terrible, ugly sweater they knitted themselves for Christmas, would you wear it to school to make them happy, or "accidentally" lose it?
The Santa Trap If you caught Santa Claus in your living room and you had enough evidence to blackmail him for anything in the world, what would you demand?
The Mariah Carey Curse If you were locked in a room and had to listen to "All I Want for Christmas is You" on repeat for 24 hours to win a new car, would you do it, or would you lose your mind?
The Reindeer Swap If you were Santa but you were allergic to reindeer, what animal would you use to pull your sleigh instead? (e.g., "If I were Santa, I would use giant flying cats...")
